name: Data Preparation
description: Removes stop words, lower-cases words and removes non-ascii characters.

input column.description: When using CSV, defines the column to use this operation on. Defaults to 'text'

output column.description: When using CSV, defines the existing or new column name to (over-)write the output to.

remove stopwords.description: Remove insignificant words that are of little use for traditional NLP.

lowercase.description: Toggle to convert text to lowercase.
